name: Totems Egg
description:
Bring your egg in front of the four totems to have your task accomplished.

Keep your baby alive and craft stuff to defend your egg.

Guide :
Keep egg warm and safe with you (carry with F). Craft spear and bow before exploring. Bring egg to the 3 animal totems and to the last totem to win the game. Don't let the fox steal the egg. Don't let the wolves and bears kill you. Be the greatest penguin of the tundra.

Controls :

========

- WASD : move around
- F : interact
- C : craft menu
- LBM : Spear attack - must craft spear first
- RMB : Bow attack - must craft bow and arrows first
- I : Spawn player

Totem's position :

=============

wolf totem : north west, in the dense forest
bear totem : north east, in the snowy mountain
fish totem : south west, on an island in the frozen fjord
egg totem : south east, on the hatching beach
